thread.title: return visit to our favourite hotel in Rome
thread.title_full: return visit to our favourite hotel in Rome - Review of Hotel Giuliana, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: BowralGillian
title: return visit to our favourite hotel in Rome
text:
This is far and away the friendliest and most welcoming place in Roma. Generous rooms, comfortable beds, great location, but above all wonderful people. Stayed for only a few nights but wish we could have stayed longer. I recommend this hotel to everyone and also should mention that their website is very easy to use to book directly and get great feedback and best rates. Thank you Hotel Giuliana for yet another wonderful visit to Roma.
